files.patch:
@@ -2197,3 +2197,3 @@
-  return allocation->type() == ZPageType::large &&
-         is_multi_partition_enabled() &&
-         sum_available() >= allocation->size();
+  return is_multi_partition_enabled() &&
+         allocation->type() == ZPageType::large &&
+         allocation->size() <= sum_available();
